openaiSpec.name: mboum_options_data
openaiSpec.description: Access MBOUM's options data API for options chains, unusual options activity, implied volatility metrics, and options flow. This plugin focuses exclusively on stock options data rather than underlying equity information. Use this plugin for questions about options chains, expiration dates, unusual options activity, implied volatility changes, or options flow data for specific stocks or market segments.

requestDetails.description: An object containing the target Mboum options data endpoint and its specific parameters.

endpoint.description: The specific Mboum API endpoint for options data. Select the most appropriate endpoint based on the user's request.

queryParams.description: Parameters required for the selected endpoint. Different endpoints need different parameters.

ticker.description: Stock symbol for options data (required for 'options' and 'options_v2' endpoints).

type.description: Asset type filter (required for 'unusual_options_activity', 'iv_rank_percentile', 'iv_change', 'most_active', 'options_flow', and 'options_v2' endpoints).

expiration.description: Options expiration date as Unix timestamp (optional for 'options' endpoint).

display.description: Display format for options data (optional for 'options' endpoint).

date.description: Date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional for 'unusual_options_activity' endpoint).

price_min.description: Minimum price filter (optional for 'unusual_options_activity', 'iv_rank_percentile', and 'iv_change' endpoints).

direction.description: Direction filter for IV change (optional for 'iv_change' endpoint).

page.description: Page number for paginated results (optional for 'unusual_options_activity', 'iv_rank_percentile', 'iv_change', 'most_active', 'highest_iv', and 'options_flow' endpoints).

from_date.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional for 'options_v2' endpoint).

to_date.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional for 'options_v2' endpoint).

limit.description: Limit number of results (optional for 'options_v2' endpoint).
